alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:13AM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Yuma County through 245 AM MDT... At 213 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Eckley, or 6 miles east of Yuma, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eckley around 225 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
